```{r}
saf_conc1 <- saf_conc %>% str_replace_all(c('", ' = '\n\n', '\"' = '', '\n\n\n' = '\n\n')) %>% str_replace(fixed('c('), '') %>%  str_replace(fixed(')@'), '\n') 
```
